attributes.action: LIFT THE BAN of XL BULLYS ! MAKE A CHANGE
attributes.additional_details:
I want this to happen because its not the dogs fault it's the way you bring them up

Any BREED can be taught to be  AGRESSIVE its about time we STOP BLAMING the WRONG end of the LEASH

A Dog is like OUR children you bring them up the wrong way they will turn out that way you show them LOVE AND AFFECTION they will show you the same back
attributes.background:
I would like to stop the ban as its not the dogs it's the owners
have met many dogs of this specific breed over the past year and NOT ONE has been AGRESSIVE and each and everyone of them have been surrounded by FAMILIES with YOUNG and OLDER CHILDREN

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611
